alert.note: Alert for Ashley; Chicot (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 25 at 11:50PM CDT until June 26 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 385 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 2 AM CDT MONDAY FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN ARKANSAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST ARKANSAS ASHLEY CHICOT IN LOUISIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 3 PARISHES IN NORTHEAST LOUISIANA EAST CARROLL MOREHOUSE WEST CARROLL IN MISSISSIPPI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 13 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI ATTALA HOLMES HUMPHREYS LEAKE MADISON YAZOO IN EAST CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI KEMPER NESHOBA NOXUBEE WINSTON IN NORTHWEST MISSISSIPPI WASHINGTON IN WEST CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI ISSAQUENA SHARKEY THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ANGUILLA, BASTROP, BELZONI, BROOKSVILLE, CANTON, CARTHAGE, CROSSETT, DE KALB, DERMOTT, DURANT, EPPS, EUDORA, GOODMAN, GREENVILLE, HAMBURG, ISOLA, KOSCIUSKO, LAKE PROVIDENCE, LAKE VILLAGE, LEXINGTON, LOUISVILLE, MACON, MADISON, MAYERSVILLE, NORTH CROSSETT, OAK GROVE, PEARL RIVER, PHILADELPHIA, PICKENS, RIDGELAND, ROLLING FORK, SCOOBA, TCHULA, WEST CROSSETT, AND YAZOO CITY.
